Nzanyi (nkè á makwaara dị kà Njanyi, Nzangi, Njai, Njeny, Zani, Zany, Jeng, Jenge, Njei, Njeing, Kobotshi) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa na Adamawa Steeti na Maiha LGA, na n'akụkụ ókèala na Cameroon
Asụsụ ndị á bụ Dede, Hoode, Lovi, Magara, Maiha, Mutidi, Nggwoli, Paka, na Rogede.

Na Cameroon, á na-asụ Njanyi n'akụkụ ókèala Naijiria ná mpaghara Doumo (Mayo-Oulo commune, Mayo-Louti department, ná Dembo na Basheo communes, Bénoué department, Northern Region) site n'ihe dị Kà ndị na-asụrụ yá 9,000
